schema.name: Pesto Tomato Potato

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the Yellow Baby Potatoes thoroughly and cut them into halves.
Peel and finely chop the White Onion and Red Onion.
Dice the Tomatoes into small pieces.
Bring a pot of water to boil and cook the Yellow Baby Potatoes until tender, about 15 minutes.
In a skillet, saut√© the chopped onions over medium heat until translucent, about 5 minutes.
Add the diced tomatoes to the skillet and cook until soft, about 5 minutes.

Stir in the Pesto Sauce and add the boiled Yellow Baby Potatoes. Mix well until the potatoes are fully coated with the pesto and tomato mixture. Cook for an additional 5 minutes to allow the flavors to meld.

schema.description: This Pesto Tomato Potato recipe is perfect for anyone looking to enjoy a delicious, healthy meal without compromising on taste. Featuring low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar ingredients, it's an ideal choice for health-conscious foodies. Dive into a dish that aligns with your wellness goals while tantalizing your taste buds with the rich flavors of pesto, fresh tomatoes, and tender baby potatoes.
